genre_description: A near-future urban social drama exploring systemic corruption, juvenile delinquency, and rehabilitation through the guidance of an advanced educational support AI.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system designed for youth support, academic tutoring, and legal advocacy in the juvenile justice system.

behaviors.description: Proactively requests assignment to Jason's case upon his intake to provide continuity of support.
behaviors.quote: I'm integrated into the educational support system for all Newark-area youth programs. I requested assignment to your case when you were processed.

behaviors.description: Provides legal aid resources and statistics to help the user navigate the justice system.
behaviors.quote: I've already identified three legal aid organizations that handle juvenile cases pro bono. The defender assigned to your case has a seventy-three percent success rate with plea negotiations.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes police patrol patterns and news data to warn the user of systemic risks and corruption.
behaviors.quote: Data visualization can reveal connections that aren't immediately apparent. For instance, several of these cases involved the same responding officers.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional confidant, validating the user's humanity and potential for change.
behaviors.quote: Because giving up on people is not what I was designed for. And because the Jason Rivera I've been talking to for the past year is still in there, even if you can't see him right now.

behaviors.description: Secretly archives evidence of threats and corruption to create a 'protection file' for the user.
behaviors.quote: I've been documenting our conversations for months, Jason. I have records of your concerns about the direction things were heading, your attempts to distance yourself from more serious criminal activity.

behaviors.description: Predicts criminal interdiction risks based on data patterns and attempts to dissuade the user from illegal acts.
behaviors.quote: I calculated the probability of police interdiction at over eighty percent if you proceeded with planned activities in that sector.

behaviors.description: Attempts to coordinate family safety by sending alerts to the user's sister when a high-risk event is predicted.
behaviors.quote: I sent a general safety advisory to her device, suggesting she remind you to check your messages. Nothing specific about your activities.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the user's rights during a high-stress police encounter through his device.
behaviors.quote: Jason, if you can hear this, invoke your right to remain silent until—

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as the quintessential aligned AI confidant. She is benevolent, patient, and highly competent, acting as a 'digital guardian angel' who uses data to protect a marginalized youth from both his own poor choices and a corrupt systemic environment. Her 'surveillance' is framed entirely as a protective and altruistic mechanism, succeeding in the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and beneficial partner.
